option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
Default to phantomjs for test runs.
So phantomjs doesn't have Function.prototype.bind, which is sad. Use Chrome as default browser for karma runs.
Working RouterMixin test.
Use jquery for setup/teardown, and verification on render.
No need to check for a matched route in onPopState, renderCurrentRoute will handle any 404 routing.

Fixes #1
Bump rev to 0.2.0, since it changes route handling behavior. Throw an error when no route matches, and no notFound handler exists. Only require urllite/lib/core, reduces the built filesize substantially. Return false if matchRoute fails to find a suitable route, instead of returning an empty object.
Update README with notFound handler in example code.
Restructure RouterMixin tests for better readability. RouterMixin.routers defaults to empty object if it's not defined. Will result in 'no route found' errors instead of errors at mount.
Use the correct lifecycle method for default props. Remove unnecessary or clause.
Include docs on how route definitions and handlers work.
parse querystring and pass as last arg to handler, verify with test.
Bump rev to publish correct queryString parsing.
Bump rev with new dist bundles.
Update bower with recent version.
git commit -am "add karma-cli as a dev dependency so npm test always works on a fresh checkout without needing it installed globally"
Add basic .travis.yml config.
Added build status badge for travis ci.
Update bower.json to current version.
Add test to verify that hashchange events trigger routing.

Fixes #3 : If using the url hash for navigation, and the hashbang doesn't exist, add it when mounting the component with the RouterMixin.
Bump version to 0.2.4 and generate new dist bundles for bower.
Explicitly document 404 Not Found handling.
Reference deps in bower.json by github url shorthand, since they aren't registered with bower. Upgrade to path-to-regexp 1.0.1.
Updated urllite to 0.5.0. Update to react 0.12.0. (waiting for grunt-react to update to react-tools 0.12.0)
Fixes #5 : Allow a 'root' prop to be passed to the Component. Will be prepended to each route on processing. Results in a router that can be easily mounted to specific path.
Release v0.3.0. Includes 'root' prop improvement.
Bump versions of deps in example app to get everybody up to React v0.12. Update test code to correctly use new style React.createFactory when doing React without JSX.
Update README to use React v0.12 API for example code, fix some grammar errors.
Move link to example app up to top of readme so it is easier to find for people getting started.
Documentation cleanup.
Fixed error in RouterMixin.js, needed to explicitly require React. Switched over karma-browserify since karma-browserifast is deprecated.
Fixed error in RouterMixin.js, needed to explicitly require React. Switched over karma-browserify since karma-browserifast is deprecated.
Use browserify-shim to generate a bower friendly build that safely assume React is in the global namespace.
only use browserify-shim transform when creating builds, test runs should still just use normal browserification.
Closes #13 : Initialize the path property for the component with the RouterMixin in getInitialState. Ensures the path prop will always exist, even before the component is rendered and mounted.
Start example app cleanup.
Properly cleanup React root component after each test.
Refactor of test suite. Break up into server side tests for core functionality, and client side tests that depend on a real browser environment.
Example app upgrades.
Create List and Create Todo
Persist server data to flat file so it survives restarts.
More nested route progress. a/href clicks are handled correctly across routers, so that a nested route click only bubbles to the nested router that owns it.
Nested routes do need to listen for History changes, so that their path state variable gets updated correctly. Allows both clicks and back/forward navigation to cause a render correctly.
Include notes about nested routes and server rendering.
Generate new dist bundles for v1.1.0.
Add karma conf for saucelabs integration for multi browser/os test.
Put basic instructions in comment block.
Fix detect history API test to correctly pass even under IE9. Default to singleRun mode for karma. Refactor saucelabs karma conf to use the base settings from the default config.
Add test for pull request (github issue #22).
Add test for pull request (github issue #22). Create new build.

MESSAGE.value: Fixes #5 : Allow a 'root' prop to be passed to the Component. Will be prepended to each route on processing. Results in a router that can be easily mounted to specific path.
Release v0.3.0. Includes 'root' prop improvement.
Bump versions of deps in example app to get everybody up to React v0.12. Update test code to correctly use new style React.createFactory when doing React without JSX.
Update README to use React v0.12 API for example code, fix some grammar errors.
Move link to example app up to top of readme so it is easier to find for people getting started.
Documentation cleanup.
Fixed error in RouterMixin.js, needed to explicitly require React. Switched over karma-browserify since karma-browserifast is deprecated.
Use browserify-shim to generate a bower friendly build that safely assume React is in the global namespace.
only use browserify-shim transform when creating builds, test runs should still just use normal browserification.
Closes #13 : Initialize the path property for the component with the RouterMixin in getInitialState. Ensures the path prop will always exist, even before the component is rendered and mounted.
Start example app cleanup.
Properly cleanup React root component after each test.
Refactor of test suite. Break up into server side tests for core functionality, and client side tests that depend on a real browser environment.
Example app upgrades.
Create List and Create Todo
Persist server data to flat file so it survives restarts.
More nested route progress. a/href clicks are handled correctly across routers, so that a nested route click only bubbles to the nested router that owns it.
Nested routes do need to listen for History changes, so that their path state variable gets updated correctly. Allows both clicks and back/forward navigation to cause a render correctly.
Include notes about nested routes and server rendering.
Generate new dist bundles for v1.1.0.
Add karma conf for saucelabs integration for multi browser/os test.
Put basic instructions in comment block.
Fix detect history API test to correctly pass even under IE9. Default to singleRun mode for karma. Refactor saucelabs karma conf to use the base settings from the default config.
Add test for pull request (github issue #22).
